Who we are

Harmonizing Knowledge with Software Solution

TriAset delivers high performance software solutions that increase the productivity, seamless interactivity and effectiveness of Treasury, Risk and Investment in both Conventional and Islamic financial instruments. With more than 15 years of specialization, we are experts in bringing complex and intertwine processes and information into simple yet exceptional user experience solutions.

Who we help

We provide solutions to help banks, corporates, and financial institutions to manage their fund, risk and investment.

We have the solution and knowledge to help organization that is involved in financial instruments for financing, funding, investment, proprietary trading or hedging. Optimizing one profitability requires the support of efficient system that in turn supported by knowledgeable and committed personnel.
Our clients include Banks, Pension Funds, Insurance Companies and Corporates dealing in Conventional and Islamic financial instruments. Bank Treasury solution is offered to Banks while Corporate will have Corporate Treasury solution. For Pension Funds and Insurance Companies we provide our Investment solution.
